name: 8-BIT LIBERATION
description:
This is a Global Game Jam 2019 entry.

This is a game about humankind, we humans lost our home planet (earth) and had to flee to a space colony, where some aliens enslaved us. Now is your turn to FIGHT BACK and find a planet for your people to treat as HOME (see what i did there? theme is home and i said home, haha i'm so funny).

For now, in the game you only can shoot enemies, and move foward in the dungeon.

You can shoot with a pistol or a shotgun (if you find it).

If you kill all the aliens (or not) and defeat Machinegun Joe, you win the game.

You move with WASD, and shoot with Left-Click

Credits

Diego Mortenssen - Lead Programmer, Lead Designer, Art Director, Music Chooser.

Fernando Ferreyra - Story Concept, Game Mechanics.

Ignacio Quiroga - EVERYTHING YOU SEE IN THE GAME (VISUALLY), HE DID IT also  Pixel Artist.
